name: "I" Hope You Enjoy This Bible Quiz | Religion | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who was the son of Jeroboam according to 1 Chronicles 9:8 (KJV)?
questions.explanation:
Ibneiah.

	Ibneiah was a Benjaminite. His name means "whom Jehovah will build up".

questions.text: According to Judges 12:10 (KJV), where was Ibzan buried?
questions.explanation:
Bethlehem.

	Ibzan was the judge after Jephthah. Ibzan had judged Israel for 30 years.

questions.text: What does the Lord cast forth like morsels?
questions.explanation:
ice.

	The Psalmist asks, "Who can stand before His cold?" This verse is found in Psalm 147:17 of the King James Version. It is the third and last time ice is mentioned in the Bible. The other two times are in the book of Job.

questions.text: Who does Jeremiah call "a man of God" in Jeremiah 35:4 of the King James Version?
questions.explanation:
Igdaliah.

	Igdaliah means "the greatness of the Lord". He was the father of Hanan.

questions.text: What kind of reproach does the wicked cometh with, according to Proverbs 18:3 of the King James Version?
questions.explanation:
ignominy.

	Ignominy means public shame or disgrace. In other words if you're a wicked person you will be shamed in front of others eventually.

questions.text: What does Numbers 21:11 (KJV) say is "in the wilderness before Moab"?
questions.explanation:
Ijeabarim.

	Before the Israelites were in Ijeabarim they were in Oboth. Injeabarim means "ruins of Abarim".

questions.text: Paul says in Romans 1:11 (KJV) "For I long to see you that I may _______" what?
questions.correct: impart unto you some spiritual gifts
questions.explanation:
impart unto you some spiritual gifts.

	He said that "in the end ye may be established". Paul wrote many letters of which Romans was the first.

questions.text: What kind of proofs does Acts 1:3 of the King James Version say Jesus shared?
questions.explanation:
infallible.

	The book of Acts is believed to be written by Luke by most Bible scholars. The "proofs" he is referring to were the miracles Jesus performed while on Earth.

questions.text: What was made of the matter of Bigthan and Teresh's plans to kill the king?
questions.explanation:
inquisition.

	Esther 2:23 says, "And when inquisition was made of the matter, it was found out; therefore they were both hanged on a tree: and it was written in the book of the chronicles before the king." Esther was King Xerxes' second head wife after Vashti was banished from the kingdom.

questions.text: According to 1 Chronicles 27:9 (KJV) who was the sixth captain of the sixth month?
questions.explanation:
Ira.

	Ira was the son of Ikkesh. He was in charge of 24,000 people.
